sql.statement: select count(*) from collectionobject
select count(determinationid) from determination where TypeStatusName is not null
create temporary table Families1 select TaxonID from determination where DeterminationStatusID = 1
create temporary table Families2 select DISTINCT tax.TaxonID,tax.nodenumber from Families1,taxon as tax where tax.isaccepted <> 0 and tax.TaxonID = Families1.TaxonID
create temporary table Families3 select DISTINCT tx.TaxonID from Families2, taxon as tx where tx.rankid = 140 and Families2.nodenumber between tx.nodenumber and tx.HighestChildNodeNumber
select count(*) from Families3
drop table Families1
drop table Families2
drop table Families3
create temporary table Genera1 select TaxonID from determination where DeterminationStatusID = 1
create temporary table Genera2 select DISTINCT tax.TaxonID,tax.nodenumber from Genera1,taxon as tax where tax.isaccepted <> 0 and tax.TaxonID = Genera1.TaxonID
create temporary table Genera3 select DISTINCT tx.TaxonID from Genera2, taxon as tx where tx.rankid = 180 and Genera2.nodenumber between tx.nodenumber and tx.HighestChildNodeNumber
select count(*) from Genera3
drop table Genera1
drop table Genera2
drop table Genera3
create temporary table Species1 select TaxonID from determination where DeterminationStatusID = 1
create temporary table Species2 select DISTINCT tax.TaxonID,tax.nodenumber from Species1,taxon as tax where tax.isaccepted <> 0 and tax.TaxonID = Species1.TaxonID
create temporary table Species3 select DISTINCT tx.TaxonID from Species2, taxon as tx where tx.rankid = 220 and Species2.nodenumber between tx.nodenumber and tx.HighestChildNodeNumber
select count(*) from Species3
drop table Species1
drop table Species2
drop table Species3
select count(TaxonID) AS TaxaInCollectionCount from taxon where TaxonID in (select TaxonId from determination where DeterminationStatusID = 1)
select count(*) from collectionobject where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= TimestampCreated
select count(*) from collectionobject where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) <= TimestampCreated
select count(*) from collectionobject WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) <= TimestampCreated;

select count(LoanPreparationID) AS ItemsOnLoanCount from loanpreparation as lpo inner join loan on loan.LoanID = lpo.LoanID where quantityresolved < quantity and (IsClosed = false or IsClosed is null)

select count(LoanID) as OpenLoanCount from loan where LoanID in (select LoanID from loan where (not (currentduedate is null)) and (IsClosed = false or IsClosed is null) and datediff(CURDATE(), currentduedate) > 0)
select count(LoanID) as OpenLoanCount from loan where (IsClosed = false or IsClosed is null)
select count(*) from locality
select count(*) from geography

select count(Name) from (select DISTINCT Name from (select g.GeographyID,g.nodenumber from locality as l inner join geography as g on l.GeographyID = g.GeographyID) as GEO, geography as g where g.rankid = 200 and GEO.nodenumber between g.nodenumber and g.HighestChildNodeNumber) As GEO2

select CASE WHEN (select count(*) from locality) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((count(localityid) * 1.0) / ((select count(*) from locality) * 1.0)) * 100.0 END AS PercentGeoReferencedLocalities from locality where not latitude1 is null
select count(*) from taxon where taxon.rankid = 60
select count(*) from taxon where taxon.rankid = 100
select count(*) from taxon where taxon.rankid = 140
select count(*) from taxon where taxon.rankid = 180
select count(*) from taxon where taxon.rankid = 220

box.title: Taxa Type Counts
box.sql: select TypeStatusName, count(determinationid) AS DeterminationCount from determination where TypeStatusName is not null group by TypeStatusName
